name: Death to Bureaucracy
description:
In the world of Death to Bureaucracy, fighting to the death is legal, but only if you have your forms in order.

Fight enemies while fighting bureaucracy.

Löve version requires Love2D installed. https://love2d.org/

Credits:

  • Music: Abstraction, JP Soundworks
  • SFX: GAMEBOY SFX PACK #1, Kenney.nl
  • Monochrome RPG artpack: Monochrome RPG artpack from Kenney.nl
